channel.title: Rsc-wrp
channel.description:
Not entirely sure where to post this. A mod can move it if need-be.
RSC-WRP - RuneScape Classic Website Restoration Project
Welcome to RSC-WRP! I'll be trying to whip up some of the old RuneScape Classic website from old pictures and such that I find. ANY pictures, HTML, CSS, etc relating to the RSC website would be very much appreciated!
[i]Most[/i] of the HTML and CSS is / is going to be made 100% by me, using only pictures to look off of.
[hr]
[i][b]Development[/b][/i]
[ul][li]Development[/li] [list] [li]Home[/li] [li]Account[/li] [list] [li]Registration[/li] [li]Login / Logout[/li] [li]Account Management[/li] [/list] [li]Forums[/li] [list] [li]RuneScape-like Forum System (QFC, etc)[/li] [li]HTML / CSS[/li] [list] [li]Basic Forum[/li] [li]Forum Home (NEED PICTURES OF THIS)[/li] [li]View Threads Page (Board)[/li] [li]View Thread Page (Thread)[/li] [/list] [/list] [/list][/ul]
[hr]
[i][b]Media[/b][/i]
Threads Page (HTML / CSS only): [img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/1476/so6.png[/img]
Thread Page (HTML / CSS only): [img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/7100/so4.png[/img]
About Page: [img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/9201/so2.png[/img]
Title Page: [img]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/4600/so5m.png[/img]
[hr]
Thread under construction, so no flamin' 'bout that please. :rolleyes:

item.title: Rsc-wrp
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:4, topic:384208”]Web-Archive

Here is the one I did…

http://web.archive.org/web/20011214022429/www.jagex.com/runescape.html[/quote]

Oh, yeah. I knew of that. Web archive is where I found most of my images, aside from the side-pillars BG (2 pillars going down on each side of the page’s content. Had to cut them from images). I would have used the HTML I found from there, and I only found a few pages saying “Your session has timed out”, but it was just so horribly done I re-did all of it myself.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

IlikeArrays:

I did this awhile back of the 2001 website. Went pretty smooth. Btw you will want to post this in the RSC section

Do you have any pictures or the like of the forums or anything else?
